channel.title: [459] Corvalis! - Emulous based with an amazing construction! POH home!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.monetized.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/text-vs-image-ads.jpg[/img]
Hi welcome to the Corvalis development team thread. This is a 459 Emulous based server by me(asshole_rule), and Imsuperman05. We feel like creating a great old school server with great pking and great content. The combat is fully entity based written by myself and Rodrigo. The player updating was also done by a friend of both of ours, Advocatus. This is not a remake server, but simply a regular RuneScape private server, just with a more oldschoolish feel. We're going to have various activities to part take in throughout the server, including custom content, and content that you would find in RuneScape. You can find some of the activities below. [/center]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RqsU5.jpg[/img]
Content
[ul][li]Construction[/li] [li]Customized server home for the whole server to used that is constructed exactly like a Player Owned House. See 1st picture.[/li] [li]Auction House[/li] [li]Entity based combat[/li] [li]Castle Wars[/li] [li]Clan Chat[/li] [li]Terrific farming done the [b]right way[/b][/li] [li]Other various skills[/li] [li]Quest system with 5+ quests[/li] [li]Music system[/li][/ul]
We're only looking for [b]1[/b] other developer!
[code] Name: Age: Past work: Skype and/or MSN: Reason we should trust you with our awesome code: [/code]

item.title: [459] Corvalis! - Emulous based with an amazing construction! POH home!
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:35, topic:453502”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=556345.msg4079457#msg4079457 date=1345223679]
Oh yeah. Please welcome Dylan to the team. Asshole_rule has not been on in a while, so I had to make the decision myself.
[/quote]

Read signature.

Also, welcome Dylan.

Goodluck with this. I hope you have fun. Is this the revengescape one or the emulous one?

Emulous, never heard of revenge scape.

On my phone ATM so if it looks weird… Not my fault.[/quote]
Ouch. that sucks

Read full topic

Skype and/or MSN: Which ever you want.

Reason we should trust you with our awesome code: caus.

item.title: [459] Corvalis! - Emulous based with an amazing construction! POH home!
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:21, topic:453502”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=556345.msg4073915#msg4073915 date=1344620693]

Good luck!

You got 474 data packed? I know AGS is not in 459

Yeah it is >.>

Godwars is in 459, lol.

That’s the first time I’ve ever heard that. I’ve always heard it was in 474

I could easily be wrong, I’m not good with that stuff…

Ignore the 459, 474 or whatever it is anyways. The point of this is to be oldschool. IDC what revision.

True. This is still going to be good if you don’t give up like a lot of projects and you don’t add stuff like dragon claws, and torva
[/quote]

I lose interest in most projects. We’re hopefully going to have this online soon so we don’t lose interest.

And trust me, none of that d claw + torva shit.[/quote]
I would play this if you put this online, it would be better than most stuff in the server advertisement section. It’s mostly Matrix leeches.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:16, topic:453502”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=556345.msg4072907#msg4072907 date=1344531880]
Proof that we will not quit:

/5/2012 9:13:47 PM Rodrigo Molina Nick Busch with this server, we cannot quit, i will not quit no matter what
8/5/2012 9:13:56 PM Rodrigo Molina Nick Busch we will work our asses off for this
8/5/2012 9:14:09 PM Nick Busch Rodrigo Molina i’m gonna hold this to you
8/5/2012 9:14:11 PM Rodrigo Molina Nick Busch i will implement some minor donation systems so we can pay for the vps, website, etc.
8/5/2012 9:14:12 PM Nick Busch Rodrigo Molina for our whole life
8/5/2012 9:14:16 PM Rodrigo Molina Nick Busch lfmao
8/5/2012 9:14:18 PM Rodrigo Molina Nick Busch lmfao*
8/5/2012 9:14:22 PM Nick Busch Rodrigo Molina im srs
8/5/2012 9:14:39 PM Rodrigo Molina Nick Busch say something too
8/5/2012 9:14:43 PM Rodrigo Molina Nick Busch so i can hold it to u
8/5/2012 9:15:34 PM Nick Busch Rodrigo Molina we’re going to work on this for freaking ever, making it the best server known to jesus, if not i’ll send rodrigo my whole paypal acc

[/quote]
What if you get killed

On topic: Beast development.[/quote]Then nick will make a robot and take my brain and put it in the robot and i will code 4ever!!

Read full topic
